item.title: BLA
item.description: You are lucky to even be doing this for us needs to be sleeker. Do less with more try a more powerful colour concept is bang on, but can we look at a better execution, yet make the font bigger can you please change the color theme of the website to pink and purple? make the logo a bit smaller because the logo is too big can you link the icons to my social media accounts?
